name: Down is Up
description:
Hi there!

WASD/Arrow keys to move, W, up, or space to jump

Use the gravity switch to your advantage, you can get a lot more height by going down first ;)

This game was made for Minijam 128: Health

All assets, including art code and music were made during the time of the jam by me (Chazi)

The theme for the jam was Health and the limitation was "The only way to go is up" so I made a platformer where you don't really fall down, cause gravity brings you back up.

The health theme is less apparent, mainly because I didn't have enough time to show the story behind the game (I had work this weekend so I had very little time) but Health was the whole inspiration behind the game. The idea of switching back and forth between white on black and black on white came from the idea of Mental health. If I had more time the game would be about someone dealing with loneliness, as that is something I have dealt with a lot personally.

Anyways! Hope you have fun playin.
